snippet: U.S. health officials are investigating at least 10 cases of children in Colorado who developed limb weakness or paralysis after testing positive for a respiratory virus, state health officials said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Colorado, CDC Probing 10 Cases of Virus-Related Paralysis in Kids
headline.main: Colorado, CDC Probing 10 Cases of Virus-Related Paralysis in Kids

lead_paragraph: U.S. health officials are investigating at least 10 cases of children in Colorado who developed limb weakness or paralysis after testing positive for a respiratory virus, state health officials said on Monday.
